CSS preloaders

David Granjon

2020-09-18

Source: vignettes/css-preloader.Rmd
css-preloader.Rmd

How to set up a preloader

Pass the argument preloader = TRUE to the dashboardPage() function. You can also change the loading duration (2s by default): duration = 5 for 5 seconds.


library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(shinydashboardPlus)

shinyApp(
  ui = dashboardPage(
    preloader = TRUE,
    header = dashboardHeader(),
    sidebar = dashboardSidebar(),
    body = dashboardBody(),
    title = "DashboardPage"
  ),
  server = function(input, output) { }
)
